title: NEVERMORE
plainLyrics:
*7 bells
kaze ni yure
kiete itta
motomeni
saita hana

(wa wo i) nemui sora no shita de
futari yorisotteta
kimi wa boku o mitsume
yasashiku hohoemu yo
hizashi no kage de
sotto kuchidzuke o
shite mita
toki nagare
subete tomaru
futarino sekai de
ima kimiwo
hanasanai to
kono mune ni
chikau

futari de arui teta
machi no namikimichi o
ima wa hitorikiri de
aruite furikaeru
kimi no kata o
mitsumeru hitomi mo
mō mienai
kaze ni yure
kiete itta
motomeni saita hana
omoidasu tsuyoku kimi o
dakishimeta kioku o

kimigaita
kono kisetsu ni
futari no kiseki o nazoru
mōdaremo
aisanai to
kono basho de tsubuyaku
ikusen no
toki o koete
futatabi deau koto
mata atte
sagashi tsudzuke
kono basho de
futari wa
mōichido deau
